text: Marco Virgilio Ferrari (27 November 1932 - 23 November 2020) was an Italian Roman Catholic prelate. He was the Auxiliary Bishop of Milan from 1987 to 2009. Ferrari was born in Bergamo, Italy. Ferrari died in Cassano Magnago, Italy on 23 November 2020, just four days before his 88th birthday.Bishop Marco Virgilio Ferrari ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Bergamo
